name: Faceless (itch) (The Redcoat)
description:
Faceless is a 2D platformer game made in Unity.

Curious teenager Jean comes to the Nix Santos Exhibition to find the artist's meaning that they had put into their work before they had died, Sadly art is slightly more than surface level as Jean finds out after being pulled inside.

Special thanks to Ashton (parasyte127 on Instagram) and Fahimah (peach_skyies on Instagram) for being my partners during this team project, They're great artists and great to work with in general! 

The third project! (But the first one done as a team!)
